ygData.subject: Re: Casting pets at level nine
ygData.msgSnippet: It is more likely that your skills assosciated with casting a pet have increased to the point where you are able cast a pet. These would be channeling and
ygData.messageBody:
It is more likely that your skills assosciated with casting a pet have increased
to the point where you are able cast a pet. These would be channeling and
congguration I beleive.

Inos
Veeshan


Danette Barber wrote:

> From: "Danette Barber" <shardesane@...>
>
> I was also able to cast a pet at 4 bubbles into level 9, where prior to that
> I could not. The only answer that I have been able to come up with is that
> perhaps you get mana increases each time you fill a bubble. If not, it may
> be a bug of some sort.
>
> Dandara/Cazic-Thule
